heading: HB08030
0: AN ACT STRENGTHENING THE BARANGAY UNIT THROUGH SUPPORT FOR BARANGAY OFFICIALS AND BARANGAY VOLUNTEER WORKERS, AMENDING REPUBLIC ACT NO. 7160 PROVIDING FUNDS THEREFOR, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
status: Pending with the Committee on LOCAL GOVERNMENT since 2018-08-08
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08030
FULL TITLE : AN ACT STRENGTHENING THE BARANGAY UNIT THROUGH SUPPORT FOR BARANGAY OFFICIALS AND BARANGAY VOLUNTEER WORKERS, AMENDING REPUBLIC ACT NO. 7160 PROVIDING FUNDS THEREFOR, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Grants barangay health workers and barangay tanods monthly honorarium of Five Hundred (P500) pesos. In addition to financial benefits, they shall also be provided with training and workshops to effectively exercise their duty, PhilHealth coverage and free legal services.
ALIAS NAME : “Support for Barangay Workers Act.”
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2018-08-06
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON LOCAL GOVERNMENT ON 2018-08-08
